data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Reporter: Please address the allegations: did you in actuality leak information to a foreign agent?
Congressman: I ____ assure ____ that ____ potential ____ do ____ originate ____ our ____.
Reporter: In ____ case, how ____ news ____ our ____ weakness ____ to ____ the ____ borders?
Congressman: I cannot in confidence answer that question.
data.partBlankContent:
Reporter: Please address the allegations: did you in actuality leak information to a foreign agent?
Congressman: I c__ assure y__ that a__ potential le___ do n__ originate fr__ our off___.
Reporter: In th__ case, how w__ news o_ our indus_____ weakness all____ to esc___ the nati____ borders?
Congressman: I cannot in confidence answer that question.
data.fullContent: Reporter: Please address the allegations: did you in actuality leak information to a foreign agent? Congressman: I can assure you that any potential leaks do not originate from our office. Reporter: In that case, how was news of our industrial weakness allowed to escape the national borders? Congressman: I cannot in confidence answer that question.
data.answer: 记者:请您谈谈这些指控:您确实向外国间谍泄露了信息吗? 国会议员:我可以向你保证，任何潜在的泄密都不是来自我们的办公室。 记者:在那种情况下，有关我们工业疲软的消息是如何得以传播出去的? 国会议员:我不能肯定地回答这个问题。
